results.name: The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Celeron or Better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

results.name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (1998)
DragonLance Vol. 3: The Dark Queen of Krynn

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later, 32-bit or 64-bit
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is powered by DOSBox.
